summary: This is an UberConference email invitation from The Bloom Firm for a conference call scheduled for January 23, 2020, regarding Epstein. The email lists six participants, including several email addresses associated with The Bloom Firm.

events.title: Epstein Conference Call

keyFacts: The Bloom Firm organized a conference call regarding Epstein scheduled for January 23, 2020.
The call included six participants, with four identifiable by email addresses: teri@l, ten@, colleen@, colleen@t, and marcelino@thebloomfirm.com.
The conference service used was UberConference by Dialpad, based in San Francisco.
